name: @penname/mongoose-page-aggregation
description: Standalone MongoDB Mongoose pagination utility via the power of aggregation pipelines

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run fix-esm-imports
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module esnext --outDir dist/esm --declaration false && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/index.mjs && rm -rf dist/esm
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run publish

author: PennameHQ
